title: Submerges
data:
{{obsolete}}

Monsters with the '''Sumberges''' flag are hidden from the player, until they become adjacent to you for the first time. While hidden, submerged monsters are undetectable, even if in clear [[LOS]] of the player.

This is usually seen when monsters dip below [[water]] or [[lava]], where they can only remain submerged while they are on a water/lava tile (respectively). [[Trapdoor spider]]s can hide inside ordinary dungeon tiles, however (think of it as burrowing underneath the floor).

==History==
*The submerging mechanic was removed in [[0.22]].
*Prior to [[0.18]], monsters with this flag could resubmerge if the player managed to escape their notice.
